final_answer.precision_note: Calculated using provided mean bond energies; integer value reflects given data precision.

method: Bond energies for bonds broken in the reactants (4 C–H and 2 O=O) were summed and subtracted from the total energy of bonds formed in the products (2 C=O and 4 O–H). The calculation follows ΔH = ΣE(broken) − ΣE(formed) using the supplied kJ·mol⁻¹ values.
